HEADER_1: Calculation of net salary in Czech Republic - 2021
HEADER_2:
Due to the Income Tax Act amendment effective from 1.1.2021, so called „super gross salary“ was abolished and the general tax credit was increased from 2030 to 2320 CZK. This leads to increasing of net wages of employees.
There are now two tax rates : 15% the standard rate and progressive rate of 23% which applies on gross income exceeding 141k CZK.
Calculate how much more you will be getting from January 20210!🤑

ABOUT_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_ANIBAL: As a foreign living in Czech Republic, when trying to search for information in English about how much would be my net income, I couldn't find any updated tool. So, I've decided to create this application according to the most recent tax law hoping to help everyone with the same problem.
ABOUT_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_DENISA: I contributed to this application by my knowledge of the Czech Taxation. We believe this might be useful for expats or other foreigners who are usually not given enough information in this matter and they are hard to be found in English.
